name: WadWorld: WadSim Chapter II - Post Apocalyptic
name_original: WadWorld: WadSim Chapter II - Post Apocalyptic
description:
WadSim2 is a game where you control your Wads in a camp in a post apocalyptic setting, and try to keep them alive. You do this by buying food, medicine and building tents.

Please join my game jam: https://itch.io/jam/wad-world-lets-make-a-franchise-together
